name: Metal Detector Simulator
description:
Metal Detector Simulator is a game about metal detecting. You have a metal detector and a shovel, use the detector to scan for items and then dig them up with your shovel.

This is currently in a prototyping stage, so gameplay may change from time to time. I'm looking for feedback and any suggestions. Please leave a comment below.

As of v0.12 - You can play in multiple maps and items are spawned randomly each time you begin.

Controls

WASD - Walk

Mouse - Look

Space - Jump

F - Swap between shovel and detector

LMB (Hold with detector out) - Use detector to scan for items

LMB (Click with shovel out) - dig

RMB (with shovel out) - Pick up item
